keys: planta de la desinfección con cloro

          <title>
            <string language="en">Killing bacteria in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tötungbakterium im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bactéries de massacre dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bactérias da matança na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Batteri di uccisione in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φονικά βακτηρίδια στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bacterias de la matanza en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration summarises the process of killing bacteria in filtered water by dissolving chlorine gas into the water in a chlorination plant.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorination plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung faßt den Prozeß des Beendens 
des Bakteriums in gefiltertem Wasser zusammen, indem sie Chlorgas in 
das Wasser in einem Chlorierungbetrieb auflöst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration récapitule le processus de 
détruire des bactéries dans l'eau filtrée en dissolvant le gaz de 
chlore dans l'eau à une usine de chloruration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração sumaria o processo de matar as 
bactérias na água filtrada dissolvendo o gás do cloro na água em 
uma planta do chlorination.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione ricapitola il processo di 
uccisione dei batteri in acqua filtrata dissolvendo il gas del cloro 
nell'acqua in una pianta di clorazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συνοψίζει τη διαδικασία τα 
βακτηρίδια στο φιλτραρισμένο ύδωρ με να διαλύσει το χλώριο 
αέριο στο ύδωρ σε εγκαταστάσεις χλωρίωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración resume el proceso de matar a 
bacterias en agua filtrada disolviendo el gas de la clorina en el agua
en una planta de la desinfección con cloro.</string>
          </description>
